laboratory_examinations.findings: D-dimer level of 2.02 mg/L (reference range: 0.00–0.55 mg/L) on initial admission.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: D-dimer level decreased to 1.06 mg/L on August 14, 2023, and further decreased to 0.19 mg/L on September 26, 2023.

laboratory_examinations.findings: R value was 4.6 min (reference range: 5–10 min).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Plasminogen activator inhibitor type 1 gene test
